transcript:
Customer: Hello.
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan sir boliye.
Customer: Haanji.
Customer: Sir main aawaz aa rahi hai aapko?
Executive: Haanji haanji aa rahi hai.
Customer: Ye jo byleads hai na saari plastic wo feed kar rahe hai mera to steel feeding motor ka kaam hai steel bottles water bottle ka feeding motor ka kaam hai. Ek stainless steel feeding bottle theek hai ye chahiye na aapko.
Executive: Haanji haanji theek hai.
Customer: Theek hai.
Customer: Haan ek second rukiye.
Customer: Ye plastic wagera ki nahi aa rahi hai.
Customer: Nahi nahi chahiye.
Customer: Line pe rahiye.
Customer: Aur steel ki to bilkul bhi leads nahi aa rahi hai.
Customer: Kya keh rahe hai?
Customer: Steel wagera ki to bilkul bhi leads nahi aa rahi hai sir pata nahi kya ho raha hai bilkul bhi kuch bhi nahi hai.
Executive: Main dekh leta hu.
Customer: Line pe rahiye.
Executive: Pehli lead hai stainless steel waterproof bottle ki hai dusri printed steel keeper bottle ki hai.
Executive: Tisri lead hai stainless steel water bottle ki stainless steel water bottle ki stainless steel water bottle.
Customer: Photo photo bhej dijiye main acche se dekh lunga. Kya hai leads apne mein chalu plastic wagera ki nahi aani chahiye bas ye dekh lo steel wagera ki aa jaye steel ki.
Executive: Haanji haanji.
Executive: Main bhai check kar raha hu ki plastic ki abhi koi bhi lead mujhe aapke liye nahi dikh rahi hai ek aad din aayi hogi pehle to wo thi but saari hi lead stainless steel ki hai abhi.
Customer: Saari hi But main jaise byleads mein ja raha hu main byleads mein gaya ab main list thi tha isme starting mein teen do teen to dikhegi mere ko steel ki fir thoda sa aage jate hi mere ko plastic ki chalu ho jayegi.
Executive: Nahi to aap mobile se dekh rahe hai kaise dekh rahe hai?
Customer: Laptop mein dekh raha hu laptop mein chalata hu. Laptop mein recommended kar lo waha pe ek option aa raha hoga recommended.
Customer: Relevant lead pe jaiye.
Customer: Haanji.
Executive: Relevant pe pehli lead kaun si dikh rahi hai aapko?
Executive: Recommended pe click kar rakha hai maine theek hai. Relevant pe pehli lead Ludhiana Punjab se stainless steel water bottle ki dikh rahi hai.
Customer: Haan stainless steel water bottle uske baad printed steel keeper bottle ki dikh rahi hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Uske baad stainless steel water bottle dikh rahi hai.
Executive: Uske baad ab to sari jab to ye niche tak steel ki aa rahi hai. Ab jaise maine abhi refresh kara to steel ki aa gayi hai but pehle do aayi nahi thi isme.
Executive: Nahi nahi aap relevant pe click kijiyega theek hai aur recent ki agar dekhna hai abhi kaun kaun si lead aayi hai to recent pe click karke bhi aap dekh sakte hai relevant pe aap jaake consume karna start karo pehle theek hai aur kyuki aap apna na ye kafi time se use bhi nahi hua hai to iske pattern na kahi na kahi missing bhi hai to abhi hum karna padega. Regular basis use kar raha tha to. Ab abhi kar rahe hai na lekin October pura use nahi hua tha. Pura mahina sirf man ke chalo 25 lead consume hua tha. September bhi nahi hua tha uske baad ab aapko regularly 2-250 lead consume karna hai pehle theek hai tarike se aur pura time deke pura thodi wo ek query wagera hai likhi likhi query aa rahi hai to perfect query. Inquiries actually kya hai na ki jabhi jaise October month mein jo inquiries aayi hai 50-60 ke aas pass aayi hai. Reason kyuki inquiry kahi na kahi lead se connected hai lead ka consumption jitlai sahi se karenge tabhi inquiry bhi develop karegi.
Customer: Aapki side se kuch improvement ho sakti hogi chalo hum to apni side se puri koshish karenge abki baar consume karne ki lead sari aapki side se bhi kuch ho sakta hoga.
Executive: Hamare side se almost almost sara improvement kar diya hai hum logo ne theek hai aur ek aur cheez main bata du aapko haan catalog ke score already 33% kiya hua hai hum logo ne theek hai to usme ab aisa kuch scopes nahi hai ki aur acha 33% theek hai badhiya score kaha jata hai. Dusra stainless steel water bottle jo hai na ek cheez main ye kar deta hu mapping dekh leta hu mapping sahi hai ki nahi wo. Haan mapping dekh lijiye mapping bhi steel water ranking kaun si hai apni steel bottle mein ranking kaun si hai apni. Main bata raha hu line pe ek steel water bottle stainless steel water bottle.

Executive: Pura dekhne ke liye aayi hai.
Executive: BPS share ki tarah hote hai.
Executive: Badhega to badhega.
Executive: Jaise share kharidte jao to gold bhi clear nahi hota.
Customer: Aap keh rahe hai ranking aap dekhne ke liye keh rahe the na.
Executive: Haan ranking kitni chal rahi hai main bata raha hu.
Executive: Humne stainless steel feeding bottle mein liya hua hai theek hai. Reh gaya. Main bata raha hu. Hum top two mein dikh rahe hai abhi theek hai. Top two mein dikh rahe hai. Haan abhi top two mein dikh rahe hai pehla maharaja hai dusra hum hai. Tisra hamara RB enterprise hai. Pehle maharaja hai fir ek RB hai. Kya? Okay first pe maharaja hai. Nahi nahi first pe to leading supplier hai to nahi aa sakta lekin top two mein hum dikh rahe hai us particular keyword mein listing hamari. Dusra main aapse ye keh raha tha ek kaam aap kar lijiyega please stainless steel water bottle mein na kuch product aur add kar dijiye jisse thoda sa inquiry aur badha ke aapko deta hai kyuki usme ek hi product added hai wo hai round feeding stainless steel bottle 140 ml. Ho sakta hai aapke pass 100 ml ke bhi honge 200 ml ke bhi product honge usi category mein. Ye matlab wo product add kar sakta hu main isme. Haan do char product us keyword mein add kar do thoda improvement ke liye theek hai. Theek hai. Baki aur bilkul absolutely fine hai kuch aisa hai nahi bahut acha hai sab kuch behtar hai bas aap use karte rahiye hai na sab kuch behtar hai koi aisi dikkat wali baat nahi hai theek hai do char product aap usme please add karwa do baki sab theek hai sab kuch okay hai theek hai theek hai to baki connect karte rahiyega aisi koi problem hai to aane wale time pe hopefully nahi hogi main guide karta rahunga mera na ek baat ki aapko ek feedback jayega sir hello haanji haanji to please usme mention kijiyega to ye aap 96 se call kar rahe the na to mera number to aapke pass hai na haanji haanji theek hai ye concern main close kar sakta hu sir haanji kar dijiye theek hai na ek feedback aayega jarur dijiye sir theek hai
summary:
Concerns:

- Receiving plastic buyleads instead of steel.

- No steel leads are being received.

- Wants to improve ranking in steel bottle category.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed all leads are stainless steel.

- Advised to filter by 'Relevant' leads.

- Suggested adding more products to stainless steel category.

- Confirmed customer is in top 2 for steel bottles.



Next Steps: 

- Customer to add more products to steel bottle category.

- Customer to provide feedback on the call.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, steel bottles, ranking, product catalog, feedback
